results.deck: One of the goriest fighting game franchises returns to its roots, introducing a new story that re-tells the events of the first three Mortal Kombat games (with a unique twist).
results.name: Mortal Kombat

results.deck: A unique cel-shaded first person action game that runs on the CryEngine 2
results.name: Drug Wars

results.deck: The miniature ninja Hiro and friends embark on a quest to defeat the Evil Samurai Warlord and his equally evil army in this quirky action/adventure from IO Interactive.
results.name: Mini Ninjas

results.deck: Join Ray McCall and his brother Thomas on a quest for gold, lust, and greed.
results.name: Call of Juarez: Bound in Blood

results.deck: Cancelled open world game that takes place in a fantasy universe
results.name: AionGuard

results.deck: An adventure game for adults by Lump of Sugar. It has been adapted into an anime series.
results.name: Tayutama: Kiss on My Deity

results.deck: Dead Rising 2 is a third-person action-adventure survival horror game that takes place five years after the end of the original Dead Rising, moving its zombie apocalypse setting into the glamorous Fortune City.
results.name: Dead Rising 2

results.deck: Orcs, lizardmen, and various other factions play each other at football in this adaption of the Games Workshop board game.
results.name: Blood Bowl

results.deck: The first Need for Speed game developed by Slightly Mad Studios. "Shift" is an attempt at the simulation sub-genre of racing games, promising a sense of speed with new realistic effects and a new crash mechanic.
results.name: Need for Speed: SHIFT

results.deck: Transformers: Revenge of the Fallen is the video game tie-in to the movie of the same name.
results.name: Transformers: Revenge of the Fallen

results.deck: Madden 10 propels us into the next decade with procedural awareness.  Madden 10 introduces a physics based player interaction engine known as Pro-Tak that features gang tackles, improved OL/DL play, and WR/DB interactions.
results.name: Madden NFL 10

results.deck: This Triangle release contains a shooter skills test, Exzeal, Trizeal Remix, Minus Zero, and lots of extras.
results.name: Shooting Love, 200X

results.deck: Battlefield: Bad Company 2 is the second installment in this spin-off Battlefield series. It has a more serious campaign and a vastly expanded multiplayer system.
results.name: Battlefield: Bad Company 2

results.deck: A game based on the 2010 film Iron Man 2. Take control of Iron Man and his new partner War Machine to take down evil with flying suits and superior firepower.
results.name: Iron Man 2

results.deck: Red Dead Redemption is the spiritual successor to 2004's Red Dead Revolver, featuring a vibrant, open world set in the decline of the American Wild West. Players take on the role of former outlaw John Marston, who is forced to hunt down his former gang to regain his family.
results.name: Red Dead Redemption

results.deck: A cancelled sequel to the 2008 Turok reboot by Propaganda Games.
results.name: Turok 2

results.deck: The fourth full game in the Dead to Rights franchise is a completely fresh start, ditching all story of past games in favor of a new story direction.
results.name: Dead to Rights: Retribution

results.deck: Virtua Tennis 2009 is the latest iteration of the Virtua Tennis series, featuring an updated roster, new minigames, and several gameplay tweaks.
results.name: Virtua Tennis 2009

results.deck: A game still in very early development phases by Track7.  It will include Greek mythology with modern day environments and characters.
results.name: Theseis

results.deck: G.I. Joe: The Game picks up where the recent film, G.I. Joe: The Rise of Cobra, left off, although it takes liberties with the film's plot and incorporates elements of the comics and television series.
results.name: G.I. Joe: The Rise of Cobra

results.deck: In this German action-RPG, Scarlett, the daughter of Death itself, sets out to rescue her ghoulish father from an evil Necromancer who threatens to destroy the world.
results.name: Venetica

results.deck: Tide of Iron is based on the tabletop wargame of the same name, developed by Fantasy Flight Games
results.name: Tide of Iron

results.deck: Alice is back, and so is her fragile grasp on reality. She must journey through both Victorian London and the dark world of Wonderland to retain her sanity and find out the truth behind her family's deaths, in this long-awaited sequel to American McGee's Alice.
results.name: Alice: Madness Returns

results.deck: In the follow-up to Lost Planet, players explore new environments as they see the story through the perspective of different groups of pirates trying to survive on E.D.N. III.
results.name: Lost Planet 2

results.deck: A cancelled game based on the Flash comic series.
results.name: The Flash

results.deck: Tiger Woods PGA Tour 10 is the latest edition of the perennial golf series, brought to you by EA Sports and EA Tiburon. The Wii version can be played with the Motion Plus adapter, while the 360 and PS3 versions utilize analog sticks for club control.
results.name: Tiger Woods PGA Tour 10

results.deck: Dead Space 2 is the sequel to the 2008 surprise hit Dead Space. The no-longer-silent Isaac Clarke finds himself trapped on a city-sized space station called the Sprawl, which has been overtaken by another Necromorph infestation.
results.name: Dead Space 2

results.deck: The sequel to the open world driving game, Test Drive Unlimited.
results.name: Test Drive Unlimited 2

results.deck: A hostess-club/dating simulator from D3 Publisher Inc.
results.name: Dream C Club

results.deck: The sequel to the BIGS aims to further refine the arcade feel of the original.
results.name: The BIGS 2

results.deck: Guitar Hero: Smash Hits is a compilation of some of the most popular songs from previous titles. This time, all songs are master recordings, and there is full band support for each track.
results.name: Guitar Hero: Smash Hits

results.deck: Split/Second is an arcade racing game by developer Black Rock Studio. The game takes place in a made-for-TV city designed for destruction.
results.name: Split/Second

results.deck: The third band-specific Guitar Hero offering from Activision, Guitar Hero: Van Halen allows you to play as the rock legends themselves.
results.name: Guitar Hero: Van Halen

results.deck: Formerly known as the NCAA March Madness Series, NCAA Basketball 09 is the exclusive NCAA Basketball game by EA Sports.  It serves as the only up-to-date college basketball simulation on the market.  Cover athlete is Kevin Love of the UCLA Bruins.
results.name: NCAA Basketball 09

results.deck: A parkour inspired game where you will be able to transform the world.
results.name: Totems

results.deck: A Superman game that was being developed by Rogue Squadron creator Factor 5, until the developer shut down in 2009.
results.name: Factor 5's Superman Project

results.deck: Salem and Rios return with a new adventure set in Shanghai called Army of Two: The 40th Day.
results.name: Army of Two: The 40th Day

results.deck: Vancouver 2010 is the official videogame of the 2010 Winter Olympics.
results.name: Vancouver 2010

results.deck: NCAA Football 10 is the 13th game in the EA's NCAA Football series. This edition of the heralded college football simulator has added a few new features to the series, such as player lock on offense and defense, higher camera angles, and a create-a-school feature.
results.name: NCAA Football 10

results.deck: A vertical arcade shooter.
results.name: Mamorukun Curse!

results.deck: Rock Band Track Pack: Classic Rock is a standalone game that packages up 20 classic rock songs from Rock Band's library.  It includes songs from The Who, Rush, Boston and The Police, among others.
results.name: Rock Band Track Pack: Classic Rock

results.deck: R.U.S.E. is an RTS developed and published by Ubisoft with "ruses" and deception as a central game concept.
results.name: R.U.S.E.

results.deck: Based on the movie of the same name, G-Force follows a team of guinea pigs who have secret lives as spies....IN 3-D!!!
results.name: G-Force

results.deck: Squeeballs Party is a family friendly mini-game collection featuring a cast of cute, colorful, and comical critters that undergo horrific mutilation at the hands of the players.
results.name: Squeeballs Party

results.deck: Plants Vs. Zombies is an action-strategy tower defense-style game developed by PopCap that tasks the player with surviving an onslaught of the undead by growing plants on their lawn.
results.name: Plants vs. Zombies

results.deck: Game based on the animated film version of the classic children's tale written by Judi Barrett.
results.name: Cloudy With a Chance of Meatballs

results.deck: After turning their infamy into worldwide fame, the Third Street Saints now find themselves at war with a powerful criminal organization called The Syndicate. Strap it on.
results.name: Saints Row: The Third

results.deck: Get your ass back to Mars in the fourth installment of the environmental destruction-focused Red Faction series. In Armageddon, players go back underground for the first time since the original Red Faction.
results.name: Red Faction: Armageddon

results.deck: The official video game based on the 2009 Hannah Montana film that allows players to control either Miley Stewart or Hannah Montana.
results.name: Hannah Montana: The Movie

results.deck: The 2009 release of the World Championship Snooker franchise featuring 32 top snooker players.
results.name: WSC Real 09: World Championship Snooker

results.deck: LEGO Rock Band is a family-friendly take on the Rock Band formula, with new songs aimed at audiences of all ages.  While the game will play similarly to other Rock Band games, it will feature LEGO characters, instruments, and venues.
results.name: LEGO Rock Band

results.deck: Atomic Games' third-person shooter, based on one of the deadliest battles in the Iraq War, has proved controversial, and is still a work in progress.
results.name: Six Days in Fallujah

results.deck: The original Trivial Pursuit board game with two new, exclusive game modes and a variety of downloadable question packs on the PlayStation 3 and Xbox 360.
results.name: Trivial Pursuit

results.deck: A "gun battle" RPG developed at tri-Ace in collaboration with SEGA.
results.name: Resonance of Fate

results.deck: Pro Evolution Soccer 2010 is the 9th and latest game in the popular Pro Evolution Soccer series. The game is being developed and published by Konami for release on Sony's PlayStation 2, PlayStation 3 and PlayStation Portable; Microsoft's Xbox 360 and Windows; Nintendo's Wii and for Mobile Phones
results.name: Pro Evolution Soccer 2010

results.deck: Developed with a Catholic priest advising, Painkiller returns in this new sequel.
results.name: Painkiller: Resurrection

results.deck: Based on the 2009 film of the same name, this adventure game puts players into the shoes of former security guard Larry Daley as he works to save the museum, his friends, and even the world.
results.name: Night at the Museum: Battle of the Smithsonian

results.deck: Activision and the History Channel bring you back to the Civil War.
results.name: History Channel: Civil War - Secret Missions

results.deck: "Live for adrenaline" in this budget racing game released for the Xbox 360, PS3 and Wii.
results.name: Ski-Doo Snowmobile Challenge

results.deck: The post-apocalyptic Fallout universe expands into Nevada in this new title in the franchise. As a courier once left for dead by a mysterious man in a striped suit, the player must now set out to find his assailant and uncover the secrets of the enigmatic ruler of New Vegas.
results.name: Fallout: New Vegas

results.deck: The third installment in the Magna Carta series.  It was released exclusively for the Xbox 360 in 2009 by Korean developer Softmax.
results.name: Magna Carta 2

results.deck: Bizarre Creations' Blur mixes the driving of the Project Gotham Racing series with explosive weaponry and allows players to race up to 20 online opponents.
results.name: Blur

results.deck: Developed by Codemasters and using the Ego engine, Formula One 2010 is the first truly next generation F1 game that contains all the cars, drivers and tracks from the 2010 season, putting a heavy emphasis on simulating real life weather effects.
results.name: F1 2010

results.deck: Samurai Shodown SEN brings the classic 2D fighting to the 3D battlefield again, with controls similar to the Soul Calibur series.
results.name: Samurai Shodown SEN

results.deck: Square Enix's turn-based mech-combat game comes to the PC, PS3, and Xbox 360 as a 3rd person shooter.
results.name: Front Mission Evolved

results.deck: This as-yet unnamed game is an interactive Fool Pitying simulation staring none other than Mr. T. It is being developed by ZootFly and will appear on Xbox 360, PS3, Wii, and PC.
results.name: Mr. T

results.deck: Future Soldier is the first in Ubisoft's long-running Ghost Recon series of tactical shooters to take place in the near-future.
results.name: Tom Clancy's Ghost Recon: Future Soldier

results.deck: Chaotic: Shadow Warriors is a video game based on the TV show and trading card game of the same name.
results.name: Chaotic: Shadow Warriors

results.deck: Revealed at TGS 2008, little is known about this game. It has since become vaporware.
results.name: Castlevania

results.deck: Planet 51 is a sandbox action adventure game based on the animated movie of the same name.
results.name: Planet 51

results.deck: Band Hero is a spin-off game of the Guitar Hero series by Activision released for the Xbox 360 Playstation 3, Wii and Nintendo DS.
results.name: Band Hero

results.deck: Witches (working title) is a game developed for PS3, PC and 360 by Revistronic. It currently has no developer and the game is set to be in a fictional medieval universe.
results.name: Witches

results.deck: Star Wars: The Clone Wars -- Republic Heroes takes place during the first and second seasons of the TV cartoon Star Wars: The Clone Wars. It features the art style of the cartoon and was released on Xbox 360, Wii, PC, Nintendo DS and Playstation.
results.name: Star Wars The Clone Wars: Republic Heroes

results.deck: Kane & Lynch 2: Dog Days makes a notable switch of the titular duo, with James Lynch now taking up the role as lead protagonist over Kane. However the two are still once again forced to endure a hail of gunfire as they find themselves embroiled in Shanghai's criminal underworld.
results.name: Kane & Lynch 2: Dog Days

results.deck: Developed by Eidos Montréal and coming more than 10 years after the previous Thief game, this is the fourth installment in and a reboot of the Thief franchise.
results.name: Thief

results.deck: The third Cricket game by Codemasters focused mainly on the Ashes tour. Also the first ever Cricket game to be released on the Wii.
results.name: Ashes Cricket 2009

results.deck: Rock Band Country Track Pack is a standalone game that wraps up 21 country songs into one retail package.  The songs are a collection of previously released DLC, as well as new tracks that have yet to appear in any Rock Band game.
results.name: Rock Band: Country Track Pack

results.deck: Agent 47 returns after a six-year hiatus to embark on a mission of redemption for the only person he could ever trust.
results.name: Hitman: Absolution

results.deck: A visual novel originally released with adult content on the PC, before seeing released versions without such content elsewhere.
results.name: Time Leap

results.deck: The seventh installment of the long-running action franchise, Call of Duty: Black Ops puts players into the early era of the Cold War (including the Vietnam War) as a member of the United States black operations unit known as the SOG.
results.name: Call of Duty: Black Ops

results.deck: Cabela's Big Game Hunter is a 2007 release of the trophy hunter franchise.
results.name: Cabela's Big Game Hunter

results.deck: Kengo: Legend of the 9 is a samurai action game for the Xbox 360. You play as 9 historical samurai and follow each of their stories, which vaguely mimic their real life accomplishments.
results.name: Kengo: Legend of the 9

results.deck: Tetris Evolution is a tetris game with many different game modes, including online multiplayer.
results.name: Tetris Evolution

results.deck: An updated version of DoDonPachi Daioujou released in 2009.
results.name: DoDonPachi Dai Ou Jou Black Label EXTRA

results.deck: Pearl Jam Live was to be a standalone expansion pack to the Rock Band platform, featuring live concert versions of the most popular songs of Pearl Jam. It has since dissolved into vaporware, with no news of a release.
results.name: Pearl Jam Live: Rock Band

results.deck: The MX vs. ATV series returns with new gameplay additions such as terrain deformation, dual stick control, a revamped trick system, and a wreck avoidance system.
results.name: MX vs. ATV: Reflex

results.deck: The 19th installment of EA Sports' long running series, NHL 10 brings a new degree of toughness through one-on-one battle refinements and a new board physics engine, as well as various EA Sports Hockey League adjustments.
results.name: NHL 10

results.deck: The third game in the popular AvP franchise. Players are be able to control one of the three deadly species in a fight for survival.
results.name: Aliens vs. Predator

results.deck: Fatal Inertia is a futuristic racer from Koei for the Xbox 360. It is based in the Unreal Engine 3 and bears strong similarities to the racing series Wipeout and F-Zero
results.name: Fatal Inertia

results.deck: Dragon Ball: Raging Blast is the second Dragon Ball game to be released for the PlayStation 3 and Xbox 360 consoles. It was developed by Spike, creators of the Budokai Tenkaichi series.
results.name: Dragon Ball: Raging Blast

results.deck: Revolution was an open-world shooter in development for PlayStation 3 and Xbox 360 at THQ's Concrete Games. Development ended in January 2008 when the studio closed down.
results.name: Revolution

results.deck: Set two years before the James Cameron film of the same name, Avatar: The Game takes place on Pandora, a gas giant's moon, and pits the merciless humans against Pandora's natives, the Na'vi.
results.name: James Cameron's Avatar: The Game

results.deck: The Zoids series makes its way to the Xbox 360 with this Japan-only release.
results.name: Zoids Infinity EX NEO

results.deck: Attempt to run a Japanese convenience store in The Conveni 200X for Xbox 360.
results.name: The Conveni 200X

results.deck: Konami's Spirits series was one of the first baseball games available for the Xbox 360.
results.name: Pro Yakyuu Spirits 3

results.deck: Nothing is as it seems. Nier must travel the world in search of a cure for his daughter who has been infected with the deadly "Black Scrawl" virus. How far will you go to save someone you love?
results.name: Nier

results.deck: The Lost & Damned and The Ballad of Gay Tony are collected onto this standalone disc of Grand Theft Auto IV's post-release content.
results.name: Grand Theft Auto: Episodes from Liberty City

results.deck: A massive open-world RPG where players could sail the vast seas and discover booty in the Pirates of the Caribbean universe. At least it would have been if the project hadn't been cancelled in late 2010.
results.name: Pirates of the Caribbean: Armada of the Damned

results.deck: The Grinder is a 4-player survival game that is a first person shooter on the Wii and a top-down action game on the Xbox 360 and PS3. Development of this game is currently on an indefinite hiatus.
results.name: The Grinder

results.deck: By the year 2027, the North Koreans have managed to unify Korea, annex Japan, and also invade the western half of the United States. As an American rebel fighter, it is the player's duty to help push the NPA out of the United States and end the citizens' suffering.
results.name: Homefront
